reviewtext: this is a usb 1.1 to ethernet adapter, and it works great with a series 2 tivo.  I use it with an old wireless router configured as a bridge to replace a wireless adapter that was not working reliably.Series 2 tivo has a usb 1.1 port and does not use usb 2.0, so there is no need to use a faster adapter.This device was simple to set up.
